thread.title: Fernanda Carrascal Lands at Stock.com as Director of Affiliate Marketing
thread.title_full: Fernanda Carrascal Lands at Stock.com as Director of Affiliate Marketing

title: Fernanda Carrascal Lands at Stock.com as Director of Affiliate Marketing
text:
Print This Post 
Fernanda Carrascal has joined Stock.com as its newest Director of Affiliate Marketing, in a senior move that will see her based out of Israel, according to information made public on her Linkedin profile. 
Ms. Carrascal joins Stock.com after a lengthy career in managing online marketing activities for both B2C and B2B companies in the realm of gaming, e-commerce, and telecommunications. Prior to joining Stock.com, she has served as the Director of Affiliate Marketing at AffOption since late 2014. 
The majority of her career has been relegated to the field of affiliate marketing, having worked extensively in marketing analysis, campaigns optimization, partnerâ€™s recruitment, social media, and marketing strategy. 
Furthermore, she has worked in a number of other senior level roles at C.G. Marketing as its Head of Affiliates as well as Wingate Ventures. Additional stops include Realis Holdings, Netvertise Ltd, and iGaming, among others. 
Stock.com is the equities centric brand of Leadcapital Markets, a broker dealer that is affiliated with Nicolas Trepiddes and is believed to use technology and support from Markets Limited. The brokerage house is licensed and regulated by CySEC and is registered with the regulatory bodies of all EU member states.   How do you feel about the article? Educated 0
